website_summaries.verdict: The Tour360 continues to push the boundaries by adding unexpected pieces to the family. Each item from the collection boasts something unique. For the case of the Adidas Tour360 Knit, the characteristic of the special upper material brings a different approach. The modern look is much welcomed by the golfers.The shoe manages to garner plus points in comfort, style, and stability, which mostly are qualities that are looked for.
pros: The combination of comfort and style of the Adidas Tour360 Knit has been highly appreciated by many
Several commenters notice that the water-repellent feature is useful as it keeps the foot dry and cool whatever the weather is
The knit upper offers excellent fit and support that are beneficial throughout the swing, according to a considerable number of purchasers
A couple of reviewers have commended the grip of the shoe
The spikes provide stability when making a swing
A few consumers observe that the trainer is well-constructed and composed of high-quality materials
A handful of reviewers attest that the trainer is extremely lightweight
The knitted upper gives off a breathable feel, says some commenters
The unique design of the outsole allows easier cleaning because it doesn’t get clogged with grass, mud, and sand, said a small number of buyers
cons: First-time users of this Primeknit golf shoe say that it takes some getting used to
One complains about the collar not being tight enough

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: These shoes fit like a glove ..... wear a 10,5 but it wont hurt if you go up a half size .... that goes for any crossknit shoe
customer_reviews.author: Chaz

customer_reviews.title: Wow, really nice.
customer_reviews.text: My last pair from a major golf co. {foot something} was very uncomfortable. these are so snug with extra elastic around ankle. I got the red/blue/white.and are very neat looking. Started shooting par all the time. {just kidding}. but I do look better playing bad.
customer_reviews.author: Norman R. Scarberry

customer_reviews.title: My husband loved them!
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my husband and he loved them! They fit great and he said he had the best looking feet on the course!
customer_reviews.author: TxStar09

customer_reviews.title: Look nice but not not for my feet
customer_reviews.text: They looked nice but I felt tightness on the top of my left foot especially when I bent it. Do not have this problem with other Adidas golf shoes.
customer_reviews.author: Two Tigers

customer_reviews.title: Rubs Ankle
customer_reviews.text: I had the older version ultra boost golf shoe before this model. This model has two bad features. The first bad feature is that is rubs on your heels. I am constantly getting blisters on the back of my foot. Second my feet are sore after my golf rounds in these shoes. The older ultra boosts I never had sore feet after a round. I do not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit me well.
customer_reviews.text: Not fond of the elastic over the top of the foot...gets uncomfortable after about an hour of wear. Definitely waterproof. Looks sharp.
customer_reviews.author: DoctorOfGolf

customer_reviews.title: Looks great but for Narrow Feet
customer_reviews.text: The shoes look great and are easy to put on. But, they are narrow. They and great for narrow feet but not for a wide foot.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria Hedgecock

customer_reviews.title: Very Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I couldn't be happier with the way they feel, great purchase! highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Heras

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My dad really like this shoes. He said it’s very comfortable !
customer_reviews.author: Olivia

customer_reviews.title: Like a glove
customer_reviews.text: These fit like a glove! Plus even though they have the "knit/stitched" look, they have a thick base that will provide stability and shield against any moisture on the grass.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony J Paolella

customer_reviews.title: light and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: The shoes were little different from the size of the shot. They were light and cushioned. Although he has not played golf rounds yet, he is looking forward to waterproof functions. Overall, I am satisfied with the product.
customer_reviews.author: Byung-ki Lee

customer_reviews.title: Quality built shoe
customer_reviews.text: These are comfortable through the sides and top of the shoe, yet feel really firm on the sole. They are breathable and light for hotter climates. Well done, Adidas!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent support and comfort
customer_reviews.text: I could wear these all day! Very comfortable golf shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Ed C.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t fit.
customer_reviews.text: The foot box of the knit golf shoe is waaaaay too narrow. I doubt that getting a half size larger would solve the cramped foot box.
customer_reviews.author: John S. Wong

customer_reviews.title: Important
customer_reviews.text: Digs into toes as you are walking. Only made it through 4 holes before i had to change into other shoes. Other than that they fit great and have plent of cushioning.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: They are a little uncomfortable after you wear them for a little bit but other than that day fi
customer_reviews.author: Parker7313

customer_reviews.title: BOOOOST!
customer_reviews.text: Boosts are the most comfortable sneakers I’ve ever worn, and wearing boosts on the course now is even better. Absolutely love em.
customer_reviews.author: Derek D.

customer_reviews.title: Comfort!!!
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the best/comfortable golf shoes I have owned!!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Norman

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Shoe But Tore My Feet Up
customer_reviews.text: Great looking shoe, just don't walk in them... you'll be fine...
customer_reviews.author: Nash418

customer_reviews.title: Wrong order
customer_reviews.text: Wrong size order a size 10 needed shoes for a golf tournament tomorrow.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Fit
customer_reviews.text: Wanted to break them in. Walked 18 holes out of the box. Found the mid to rear foot was great comfort and support. Got 2 blisters on my toes. Tight toe box. May make them my cart shoes. Will give them another walking trial.
customer_reviews.author: shifty

product_meta.title: adidas mens Tour360 Knit
feature_bullets: Premium Knit upper with water resistant technology for an athletic look and a soft, comfortable feel
Updated bottom unit features new TPU top plate which wraps higher in the saddle and heel for increased stability and performance
TORSION TUNNEL provides independent flexibility and control between the heel and forefoot while providing enhanced arch support and improved green friendliness
